short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Peek at the execution of a transaction before signing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Peekablock shows the effects generated by the transaction suggested by a website for a user signature in metamask

Such effects include:
- ERC20/ERC721 Transfers
- ERC20/ERC721 Approvals

It is crucial to see what you sign in order to avoid scams online!
